S.FORM: azua a tjaucikel, na kemasi tjagaraus itjen a mapuljat. sa naseman vurung tua qatjuvian.
azoa a tjaocikel, na kemasi tjagaraos itjen a mapoljat. sa naseman vorong toa qatjovian.
izua za matjatjelu a pinakaqapulu a qaqinaljan i padain aya, i paiwan aya, i piuma aya, sana kemasi izua anga a mavadavaday anga.
izoa za matjatjelo a pinakaqapolo a qaqinaljan i padain aya, i paiwan aya, i pioma aya, sana kemasi izoa anga a mavadavaday anga.
mavan anga azua pinaka raval aya, vuculj aya, piumauma aya, paqaluqalu aya.
mavan anga azoa pinaka raval aya, vocolj aya, piomaoma aya, paqaloqalo aya.
sa amin itjen a semusususua tua semanvusam a masan mazazangiljan.
sa amin itjen a semosososoa toa semanvosam a masan mazazangiljan.
na masansimatjelj a tjalja tjaljetjaljen a caucau, paru mazazangiljan aya, mazangilj aya, rakac aya, qatitan aya.
na masansimatjelj a tjalja tjaljetjaljen a caocao, paro mazazangiljan aya, mazangilj aya, rakac aya, qatitan aya.
azua paqulid ini a maqati a papucekelj a mazazangiljan katua qatitan, pinaka papungdan tiamadju.
azoa paqolid ini a maqati a papocekelj a mazazangiljan katoa qatitan, pinaka papongdan tiamadjo.
izua azua masantjelulj a tjalja pazangalan a pinaka qata aya, "reretan aya, dragaman aya" nua mazazangaljan.
izoa azoa masantjelolj a tjalja pazangalan a pinaka qata aya, "reretan aya, dragaman aya" noa mazazangaljan.
mavan anga azua sinan sauzaya sauzayan nua mazazangaljan. nu mecevung a tjara mamazangizangiljan nu uri pucekelj, mavan anga azua tjalja pazangalan a sinanlisi tua pinaka mamazangiljanan.
mavan anga azoa sinan saozaya saozayan noa mazazangaljan. no mecevong a tjara mamazangizangiljan no ori pocekelj, mavan anga azoa tjalja pazangalan a sinanlisi toa pinaka mamazangiljanan.
izua uta masan lialiaw a palisian, mavan a na masan tjalja pazangalan a pinaka "maljeveq" aya. izua pulingaw a kinemenem tua sipalisian.
izoa ota masan lialiaw a palisian, mavan a na masan tjalja pazangalan a pinaka "maljeveq" aya. izoa polingaw a kinemenem toa sipalisian.
izua pinaka pulima aya, inika palaing tu uqaljay tu vavayan. izua uqaljay a kisanvecik venecik: paru tua cukes aya, langalj aya, tjakit aya, kisanseman reretan aya.
izoa pinaka polima aya, inika palaing to oqaljay to vavayan. izoa oqaljay a kisanvecik venecik: paro toa cokes aya, langalj aya, tjakit aya, kisanseman reretan aya.
izua vavayan a pulima uta: paru kisan cemepu aya, temeqic tua situngan aya.
izoa vavayan a polima ota: paro kisan cemepo aya, temeqic toa sitongan aya.
izua kivecik a vavayan a pitualima; izua kivecik a uqaljaqaljay a pitua kinacavacavan.
izoa kivecik a vavayan a pitoalima; izoa kivecik a oqaljaqaljay a pitoa kinacavacavan.
mabulayan a vinecikan sa talidu itjen a pacun.
mabolayan a vinecikan sa talido itjen a pacon.
talidu itjen a pacun nu zemiazian itua pucekecekelj a na marava, na temarar sana pukava sana pukavalu sana pukavaluan a vavayavayan,
talido itjen a pacon no zemiazian itoa pocekecekelj a na marava, na temarar sana pokava sana pokavalo sana pokavaloan a vavayavayan,
na tjemalupung a rakac a uqaljaqaljay tua katjepalaljan nua qadris.
na tjemalopong a rakac a oqaljaqaljay toa katjepalaljan noa qadris.
valeljevelj a vavayavayan, sasauqaljay sasauqaljaqaljay angata uqaljaqaljay nua sepaiwan!
valeljevelj a vavayavayan, sasaoqaljay sasaoqaljaqaljay angata oqaljaqaljay noa sepaiwan!
